title: senior / analyst, data science, office of dgcmio (research)
company: singapore health services pte ltd (singhealth hq)
description:
you will play a critical role in making high-quality, research-ready data available to support translational and ai research through data engineering initiatives such as data cleaning, structuring, and standardisation. you will assist in mapping clinical datasets to standardised frameworks such as the omop common data model, implementing natural language processing (nlp) techniques for unstructured data processing, and contributing to the de-identification and secure linkage of clinical and operational datasets for multimodal and cross-cohort studies.
you will work with principal engineers to develop and refine de-identification frameworks, assist in securing data linkage, and the automate analytical workflows to support multimodal and cross-cohort research studies. you will use strong analytical skills and collaborate with researchers, data scientists, and it teams to enhance data usability for ai-driven healthcare research.
job requirements
bachelor’s degree in science, technology, engineering, mathematics or health sciences-related disciplines, with 3-6 years of relevant working experience in data engineering, informatics, or biomedical sciences
knowledge in sql, python, r, data visualisation
experience with llm fine tuning and/or rag is an advantage
experience in healthcare data engineering, working with ehr/clinical systems and familiarity with clinical terminologies is an advantage
knowledge in principles of data provisioning and linkages for interdisciplinary intra- and inter-institutional research
team-driven with strong communication, problem solving and analytical skills
detail-oriented with a proactive approach to data challenges

joining our dynamic data science team as a senior data analyst, where you'll play a crucial role in shaping business decisions through your analytical expertise:
salary up to $7,800 + aws + vb
5 days work week from mon to fri (10:00 am to 7:00 pm)
collaborate with a team of data scientists and data engineers to craft compelling dashboard solutions
responsibilities:
partner with product manages to pinpoint and prioritize analytical needs.
translate complex data into clear, actionable insights that drive decision-making.
define and refine data collection and analysis processes, also web-based interactive dashboards. 
implement and optimize data acquisition and integration processes. 
create and deliver best-practice reports and dashboards to present findings effectively.
requirements:
min. degree in computer science, data science or any relevant discipline
min. 4 years of working experiences as data analyst or bi developer
proficient in sql and python/r for analytics and experienced with dashboard tools like powerbi / tableau / etc
if you're ready to be at the forefront of technological innovation, contributing to the success of cutting-edge applications, we want to hear from you! submit your updated resume now!
by submitting your resume, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information per scientec’s privacy policy (scientecconsulting.com/privacy-policy).

this authorizes us to:
contact you about potential opportunities.
delete personal data as it is not required at this application stage.  

all applications will be processed with strict confidence. only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: assistant/deputy manager - analytics and artificial intelligence
description:
company description:

st logistics pte ltd


job description:

job function
corporate development (sitadel)
job summary
the assistant/deputy manager (analytics and artificial intelligence) is someone who lives and breathes data. he/she is someone who is "t" shaped - with numerous it related skills, communication skills, strategy skills with a deep specialisation in data analytics. he/she works data analytics projects - from gathering the data to doing up visualisations that aim to provide value to the business.
job responsibilities/key tasks(external)
the assistant/deputy manager (analytics and artificial intelligence) extracts and integrates data from various sources, and creates advanced models and algorithms suitable for the business use case. he conducts testing on data and ai models, interprets findings from testing, and evaluates model performance for scaling and deployment. he develops compelling and logically structured communication materials to facilitate stakeholder buy-in.
he/she works in a team setting and is proficient in statistics, scripting and programming languages required by the organisation.
he/she has strong analytical and critical thinking skills to identify and solve problems. he/she is passionate about analysing and resolving complex business problems, displaying intellectual curiosity towards using data and ai to address business needs and challenges. he/she is a data storyteller, and is able to influence key stakeholders and spearhead a data driven approach to resolve business issues.
this is an individual contributor role. however, being a senior member of the team, he/she must be comfortable with interfacing both the top leadership and the staff across all business units. he or she needs to be a mentor to younger members and always inject positive energy, like an energizer buddy.
job requirements
proficiency in programming languages like python or r is preferred
familiarity with data manipulation, statistical analysis and machine learning theories is preferred
knowledge of ai frameworks and tools is a must
professional qualifications & relevant experience
bachelor degree in engineering, economics, mathematics, computer science
5-8 years of work experience in a related role
singaporean only
"this job is in partnership with the employment and employability institute pte ltd ("e2i").

e2i is the empowering network for workers and employers seeking employment and employability solutions. e2i serves as a bridge between workers and employers, connecting with workers to offer job security through job-matching, career guidance and skills upgrading services, and partnering employers to address their manpower needs through recruitment, training, and job redesign solutions. e2i is a tripartite initiative of the national trades union congress set up to support nation-wide manpower and skills upgrading initiatives.

by applying for this role, you consent to st logistics's pdpa -https://www.stlogs.com/pages/personal-data-policy/ and e2i's pdpa - https://www.e2i.com.sg/pdpa/. "

title: data analyst (healthcare, permanent)
description:
responsibilities:
assemble large, complex data sets from a wide variety of data sources
responsible for data preparation, data mining, to create/identify opportunities through analytics
conduct exploratory data analysis and provide rapid iterations of analysis to refine problem and identify potential solutions
interpret and communicate analytical findings and insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders in order to assist in making data-driven decisions
contribute to the development of data science infrastructure, tools, and frameworks for efficient data analysis, experimentation, and model deployment
abide and adhere to data governance policies in servicing data extraction or report requests, metrics and dashboards
requirements:
master’s / bachelor’s degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., statistics, biomedical informatics, computer science, applied mathematics, or similar) with 3 years of relevant experience
demonstrated experience with python, r, or similar programming languages
working knowledge of data analysis tools and databases
strong analytical skills, with experience solving problems using data and providing practical business insights
comfortable with dealing with sets of data points from different sources
industry: public healthcare | kent ridge

title: senior analyst, data science
description:
data science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models.
join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a senior analyst, data science on our product management team in singapore.
what you’ll achieve
as a data science senior analyst, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data.

you will:
• interacts with business leaders to understand business strategy, conditions and problem areas
• contributes to business strategy and influences decision making based on information gained from deep dive analysis
• produces actionable & compelling recommendations by interpreting, exploring, identifying and communicating insights discovered from complex data sets
• partners with both internal & external sources to gather and examine data from disparate sources with the goal of discovering previously hidden insights. designs, develops and programs methods, processes and systems to consolidate and analyze unstructured data to generate actionable insights and solutions
• develops and codes software programs, algorithms, and automated processes to cleanse, integrate and evaluate large datasets from multiple disparate sources
• constructs predictive models, algorithms and probability engines; verifies model and algorithm effectiveness based on actual results

take the first step towards your dream career
every dell technologies team member brings something unique to the table. here’s what we are looking for with this role:
essential requirements
• appropriate mathematical knowledge
• statistical analysis skills
• knowledge of job associated programming languages
• macro, c, c++, visual basic programming
• understanding of business environment and industry trends
desirable requirements
• bachelor’s degree / master’s degree, solid knowledge and application of engineering concepts along with effective problem-solving ability
who we are
we believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. that’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. if you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.
dell technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. join us to build a future that works for everyone because progress takes all of us.

title: data scientist/senior data scientist (business analytics and optimization)'
description:
love what you do? there is a place for you here!
be part of our diverse and inclusive team.
job responsibilities
the team is tasked with developing creative approaches to data sourcing, deriving new variables and factoring in qualitative insights to deliver high-impact business solutions.
conduct exploratory data analysis and hypothesis testing to uncover hidden patterns and trends in customer behavior.
lead the development of advanced data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights and drive data-driven decision-making.
leverage customer data and analytics to acquire, develop, and retain high-value customers more profitably and effectively
develop a robust behavioral and needs-based segmentation to create more relevant, actionable, and personalized campaigns, offers, and engagements 
closely monitor product and area performance, operational and manpower efficiency
develop and implement predictive models and machine learning algorithms to optimize customer acquisition, retention, and engagement strategies.
utilize big data technologies and cloud platforms to manage and analyze large datasets, ensuring data quality and integrity.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data science solutions into business processes and decision-making frameworks.
job requirements
education & certification
advanced degree (master's or ph.d.) in data science, machine learning, statistics or a related field is preferred.
experience
at least 2 years of hands-on experience in analytics and machine learning or ai.
proven experience in deploying machine learning models in production environments and monitoring their performance will be an added advantage.
strong proficiency in programming languages such as python, r, and sql, with experience in using libraries like tensorflow, pytorch, and scikit-learn.
experience in big data technologies such as hadoop, spark, and cloud platforms like aws, azure, or google cloud.
other prerequisites
excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work with complex datasets to derive actionable insights.
marina bay sands is committed to building a diverse, equitable and inclusive workforce, providing equal opportunities as we grow our talent base to match our growth ambitions in singapore. our employees are committed to adhere to and abide by all rules, regulations, policies and procedures, including the rules of conduct and business ethics of the company.

title: data scientist (banking, analytics) central, cbd ~
company: persolkelly singapore pte ltd (formerly kelly services singapore pte ltd)
description:
wealth and retail banking industry
 hybrid working arrangements
duration: 6 months subject to extendable/convertible
working location: central business district, cbd
working hours: 09.00am – 6.00pm (monday to friday)
 job duties
·         strong proficiency in sql for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.
·         expertise with visualization tools like tableau, powerbi in building dynamic dashboard, visual analytics and story telling with data
·         experience with dataiku, alteryx or other etl tools for designing and operationalizing end-to-end data pipelines and workflows
·         proficiency in python for data wrangling, statistical analysis, machine learning and automation of data tasks.
·         ability to analyze large datasets, identify trends, outliers, and generate business insights
·         strong grasp of statistical techniques
·         designing and maintaining data pipelines
·         strong communication and storytelling skills for both technical and non-technical stakeholders
·         experience working cross-functionally with product, engineering, or business teams
·         domain knowledge and experience in finance industry is a plus
 requirements
bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, statistics, data science, engineering, or related field
8+ years of professional experience in a data science or analytics role

title: machine learning / ai engineer
description:
company description:

changi airport group (cag) is the manager of singapore changi airport, a leading air hub in asia and one of the world's most awarded airports. as airport manager, cag performs the key functions of airport operations, air hub development, retail and commercial activities, infrastructure development and airport emergency services. cag also manages seletar airport, and through its subsidiary, changi airports international, it takes changi's presence beyond singapore's shores through consultancy projects and investments in foreign airports. come join us today!

job description:

about the role
we are seeking a highly skilled machine learning / ai engineer to design, develop, and fine-tune ai models for a range of advanced applications, including video analytics, object recognition and detection, fraud detection, and multimodal generative ai leveraging large language models (llms). you will work at the intersection of deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing, driving innovation and ensuring our models deliver high accuracy and efficiency for real-world deployments.
key responsibilities
model selection & optimization: identify, experiment with, and fine-tune state-of-the-art machine learning models for tasks such as video analytics, object recognition/detection, fraud detection, and multimodal generative ai.
deep learning & llms: work with transformer architectures, foundation models, and generative ai to develop and enhance multimodal ai solutions.
computer vision: develop and optimize models for real-time object detection, tracking, and recognition in video streams, ensuring performance in diverse conditions.
fraud detection and other anomaly detection: design and implement machine learning models for anomaly detection and fraud prevention using advanced statistical and ai techniques.
data engineering & processing: preprocess large datasets, design efficient pipelines for real-time and batch processing, and integrate multimodal data sources (images, text, audio, video).
deployment & scalability: deploy models in production using cloud-based or edge computing solutions, ensuring performance, scalability, and cost-efficiency.
research & innovation: stay updated on the latest ai research, evaluate emerging models, and propose enhancements to improve performance and robustness.
collaboration & integration: work closely with software engineers, data scientists, and domain experts to integrate ai models into end-user applications.
requirements
technical skills:
strong experience in deep learning frameworks such as tensorflow, pytorch, or jax.
proficiency in computer vision techniques, including object detection (yolo, faster r-cnn), video analytics, and multimodal learning.
hands-on experience with llms, transformers (gpt, bert, t5, clip, etc.), and multimodal ai for text, image, and video synthesis.
experience in fraud detection and/or anomaly detection using machine learning, pattern recognition, and risk modeling.
experience in aws sagemaker for model training and deployment preferred.
familiarity with mlops and deployment on cloud platforms (aws and/or gcp preferred) or edge devices.
soft skills:
strong problem-solving and analytical thinking abilities.
ability to work in a fast-paced, research-driven environment and adapt to evolving challenges.
excellent communication skills for presenting findings and collaborating across teams.
preferred qualifications:
advanced degree in computer science, ai, machine learning, or a related field.
5 to 7 years of relevant experience.
experience working with autonomous systems, robotics, or edge ai is a plus.

title: assistant manager, data analyst - up to $6800
description:
key responsibilities:
lead the development and execution of advanced data analytics strategies, including automated pipelines and etl processes.
clean, validate, and analyze large healthcare datasets using statistical and machine learning techniques.
design intuitive dashboards and visualizations tailored for non-technical audiences.
support clinical research and quality improvement with predictive models and ai-driven solutions.
collaborate with clinical teams and partners to integrate patient-reported outcomes and enhance data accessibility.
monitor data integrity through validation and quality assurance processes.
ensure compliance with data governance, privacy laws, and responsible ai practices.
prepare clear reports and communicate insights to stakeholders for informed decision-making.
requirements:
bachelor's degree in a quantitative discipline (computer science, mathematics, data
analytics, data science, statistics or related field); master's degree preferred
minimum 2 years' experience in healthcare analytics or related field
at least 2-3 years of leadership experience is preferred
advanced proficiency in programming languages such as python, r, and sql
experience with data visualisation tools such as tableau, power bi and tibco
spotfire
experience with cloud-based analytic platforms preferably databricks
experience with statistical techniques and data mining methods, such as correlation
analysis, predictive modelling, a/b testing, and time series forecasting
experience in implementing and fine-tuning ai models, including knowledge of llms
and their applications in healthcare
experience with cloud computing platforms, particularly aws
proficiency in containerisation technologies including docker and kubernetes
experience with web development frameworks including streamlit, nextjs, and
typescript
proficiency in fastapi or equivalent rest api frameworks
knowledge of database concepts and experience with database management tools
such as sqlalchemy
experience in handling large datasets is a plus
proficiency in git version control and collaborative development
strong understanding of ci/cd and devsecops practices
strong understanding of healthcare systems and medical terminology
proven track record in stakeholder management and project delivery
strong analytical and problem-solving skills
strong communication, presentation, writing, and interpersonal skills
strong attention to detail and proven ability to handle and analyse data accurately
ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions
team player with a positive attitude and ability to work within deadlines
ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment

we regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: lead machine learning engineer (ads)
description:
get to know the team
join our dynamic ads serving team, where we are dedicated to ensuring that the right ads reach the right audience at the right moment. we lead algorithm improvements, focusing on enhancing ads inventory efficiency to maximise value for both advertisers and users. we take pride in managing the entire ads backend tech stack, which is designed to handle high query per second (qps) loads, ensuring seamless performance.
our work is not just about maintaining systems; we excel at solving complex challenges that arise in the world of digital advertising. if you're passionate about technology in the advertising landscape, you will find a home with us!
get to know the role
as a lead machine learning engineer, you will report into the head of engineering and work onsite in grab one north singapore office. this is a hands-on role involving building large-scale machine learning, control theory and optimisation solutions. you will build data-driven technologies to drive real-world impact in grab's ads business that consists of hundreds of thousands of consumers and merchants.
the critical tasks you will perform
you will partner with product teams and other engineers to solve ads business problems through machine learning.
you will drive the set direction and goals, concerning project impact, machine learning system design, and machine learning excellence.
you will re-evaluate the tradeoffs of already shipped features/ machine learning systems, and you can drive efforts across teams to reduce technical debt, designing from first principles.
you will solve complex online/ production performance and evaluation issues, that require an in-depth knowledge of how the machine learning system works with systems around it.
you will deliver codes to tie the machine learning solutions you develop to our ad delivery stack.
you will mentor junior machine learning engineers and provide insightful feedback.

title: data scientist (optimization/or)
description:
major foreign-based manufacturing organisation in singapore
key data role in singapore
employee-centric environment
our client is one of the world prominent organisation in manufacturing industry with yearly revenue in billion usd. now, it is now looking to hire an experienced data scientist (optimization/or) for its regional data headquarter in singapore.

requirements:
phd or master’s degree holder in the relevant field with minimum of 2 years of experience in phd research or work experience with decision science, operation research, math programming and optimization.
individual with bachelor’s degree and at least 5-year of relevant experience (ie in the areas of decision science, operation research, math programming and optimization) will be considered.
domain knowledge in research & development, supply chain, operation planning and/or manufacturing.
hands-on modelling/coding experience using relevant tools/libraries for math formulation and/or optimization
proficiency in programming language (e.g. python, java, r) and database programming (e.g. sql)
self-motivated, proactive, independent learner, and willing to share knowledge with broader data analytics team to build learning r&d culture.
prior work experience in supporting and liaising with peers and supporting business stakeholders in north asia market especially china.
you must be based in singapore currently and has relevant work experience in singapore.
note: please do attach your latest resume in your submission. we will not be able to process your application without your resume attachment. please rest assured that your interest will be treated with strictest confidentiality.

data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only. personal data provided will be used strictly in accordance with the relevant data protection law and hudson's personal information and privacy policy =  https://www.hudson.sg/privacy-policy/

title: data scientist - grabfin
description:
get to know the team
grabfin is empowering financial inclusion across southeast asia by combining market insights, advanced data science, and engineering excellence. we build innovative financial services for the grab ecosystem, catering to our drivers, consumers, and merchants across 6 countries. our team blends expertise in lending, payments, and insurance to create tremendous value for our customers. at grabinsure, part of grabfin, we focus on insurance products tailored for our diverse user base with cutting-edge technology and data-driven problem-solving.
get to know the role
reporting to the senior manager, data science, you will work on crafting scalable, production-grade machine learning systems to support insurance products. you'll leverage diverse datasets to develop predictive models and features, ensuring performance matches real-world needs. you'll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and engineers, turning business needs into robust machine learning solutions. this is a great opportunity to have a tangible impact on our insurance offerings and is a fully on-site role at grab's singapore one-north office.
the critical tasks you will perform
build production-ready machine learning models leveraging python, spark, and cloud-native tools.
construct and automate efficient data pipelines and feature stores for model development and deployment.
engineer features from both structured internal data and supplemental external data sources to refine customer profiling.
analyze and validate model performance using real-world datasets, ensuring in-market accuracy.
identify and preempt performance drifts, leading updates or refresh cycles for models.
present data insights and predictions to senior leadership, explaining trade-offs and business implications.
provide actionable recommendations based on model findings, such as adjustments to policies or customer engagement strategies.
debug and enhance models, addressing unexpected outcomes or operational challenges.
text:
data scientist - grabfin business/systems analysts (information & communication technology) get to know the team
grabfin is empowering financial inclusion across southeast asia by combining market insights, advanced data science, and engineering excellence. we build innovative financial services for the grab ecosystem, catering to our drivers, consumers, and merchants across 6 countries. our team blends expertise in lending, payments, and insurance to create tremendous value for our customers. at grabinsure, part of grabfin, we focus on insurance products tailored for our diverse user base with cutting-edge technology and data-driven problem-solving.
get to know the role
reporting to the senior manager, data science, you will work on crafting scalable, production-grade machine learning systems to support insurance products. you'll leverage diverse datasets to develop predictive models and features, ensuring performance matches real-world needs. you'll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and engineers, turning business needs into robust machine learning solutions. this is a great opportunity to have a tangible impact on our insurance offerings and is a fully on-site role at grab's singapore one-north office.
the critical tasks you will perform
build production-ready machine learning models leveraging python, spark, and cloud-native tools.
construct and automate efficient data pipelines and feature stores for model development and deployment.
engineer features from both structured internal data and supplemental external data sources to refine customer profiling.
analyze and validate model performance using real-world datasets, ensuring in-market accuracy.
identify and preempt performance drifts, leading updates or refresh cycles for models.
present data insights and predictions to senior leadership, explaining trade-offs and business implications.
provide actionable recommendations based on model findings, such as adjustments to policies or customer engagement strategies.
debug and enhance models, addressing unexpected outcomes or operational challenges.

title: data analyst
description:
the opportunity:
we are seeking a data analyst to join the nursing department’s analytics team at ng teng fong general hospital (ntfgh). you will work closely with clinicians, administrators, and healthcare professionals to deliver insights that enhance patient care, optimize operations, and drive strategic initiatives.
the role spans across three core areas: business intelligence, data engineering, and operations optimization.
key responsibilities: 
develop and maintain operational dashboards to support nursing and hospital performance monitoring.
support data migration and engineering efforts, preparing datasets to enable advanced analytics on next-generation healthcare platforms.
perform data extraction, transformation, and integration from hospital systems to meet evolving data needs.
conduct exploratory data analysis (eda) to uncover operational patterns, identify gaps, and generate improvement opportunities.
contribute to solution design for optimizing resource allocation, service utilization, and workflow efficiencies.
present findings and insights to clinical and management teams to support data-driven decision making.
 requirements:
bachelor’s degree in data science, computer science, statistics, engineering, operations research, or a related field.
proficiency in data querying and scripting (e.g., sql, python).
experience with data visualization tools (preferably tableau).
familiarity with data engineering concepts and platforms (knowledge of pyspark and databricks is an advantage).
strong analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail.
ability to communicate complex ideas clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
prior experience in healthcare analytics or working with electronic medical records is advantageous.
 preferred attributes:
experience in operations research, process improvement, or optimization modeling.
exposure to large-scale data platforms and cloud-based analytics solutions.
self-motivated, adaptable, and able to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

title: data scientist
description:
about us
99 group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across south east asia, specializing in digital property advertising. headquartered in singapore, it is currently operational in singapore and indonesia and employs over 500 employees. in singapore, 99 group operates 99.co and srx.com.sg, while in indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and rumah123.
join us and lead the real estate revolution!
we are looking for a junior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing sql queries and ml models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. this person will be learning the ropes to be a go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the ceo — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
what you'll be doing:
collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
perform ad hoc analysis, report, a/b test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
what we're looking for:
strong sql skill and using python for software engineering, data wrangling and ml-modelling.
familiar with libraries such as pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, tensorflow or other similar ml/dl libraries.
strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
are you ready to shape the future of real estate? join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
make your mark at 99 group. apply now!

title: it data scientist
description:
deskripsi pekerjaan
merencanakan, merancang dan mengimplementasikan arsitektur vector database data yang efisien dan scalable.
memelihara dan import data ke vector database untuk mendukung ml training proses
mengoptimalkan performa basis data untuk mendukung analisis data yang cepat dan akurat.
mengembangkan dan fine-tune ai/ml model sesuai dengan parameter yang ditentukan.
berkoordinasi dengan tim pengembangan dan analisis untuk memahami dan memenuhi kebutuhan data.
merancang dan membuat kerangka kerja tata kelola ai/ml (ai governance), termasuk standar pengembangan, mlops practices, dan kebijakan penggunaan ai yang bertanggung jawab.
melakukan troubleshooting dan pemeliharaan sistem data untuk memastikan ketersediaan dan keandalan.
mendokumentasikan proses dan prosedur terkait pengelolaan data.
kualifikasi
diutamakan sarjana manajemen informatika/teknik informasi.

title: data scientist (analytics)
description:
company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the team
grabfin analytics team supports the grabfin product and business organisations, across payments core, payments experience, lending, insurance, and kios. our team is focused on understanding user experiences and partnering with business, product, design, and tech teams to achieve the right outcomes. we are integral to product development, from understanding user journeys with ux designers, to developing hypotheses, through to post-rollout optimisation.
get to know the role
you will use data to understand user needs and be the de-facto voice of the customer (users, driver-partners, merchants, agents) across grabfin's suite of products. you will leverage data to unveil insights to help launch our products. you will provide thought leadership and generate data-driven hypotheses to solve key product and business problems, and drive our grabfin strategies forward. you will report into senior analytics manager, grabfin regional and work onsite in grab jakarta south quarter office.
the critical tasks you will perform
you will partner with product, design, and engineering teams to derive insights, design experiments, and drive key product decisions.
you will support strategic plans with data insights, performing deep-dives into user behaviour, segmented views and product efficacy.
you will provide tailored analysis for specific products and strategies, define critical business and product metrics, and make regular recommendations for continuous improvements.
you will design, measure, and recommend a/b tests and multivariate experiments, including layout optimisation, ui/ux efficacy, algorithm effectiveness, and api performance.
you will analyse clickstream and transactional data to uncover insights on user behaviour and drive product metrics. you will manage instrumentation for all feature releases within assigned tech families within grabfin.
you will develop self-serve solutions for stakeholders that are scalable and automated to handle a product environment. you will drive plans involving large language models or generative artificial intelligence.
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
you have at least 1+ years of experience in analytics, business intelligence, or data science, in a tech (fintech or e-commerce) company.
you have a bachelor's degree in statistics, analytics, economics, mathematics, engineering, or related fields.
you are proficient in writing advanced sql queries and querying large relational databases.
you have hands-on experience with data analysis and programming tools such as python or r.
you are experienced in data visualisation platforms like powerbi or d3.js to present findings.
you have experience designing, running, and analysing a/b tests and product experiments, with knowledge of hypothesis testing and the basic principles of design of experiments (doe).
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through parental and birthday leave, and give back to your communities through love-all-serve-all (lasa) volunteering leave
we have a confidential grabber assistance programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our flexwork arrangements such as differentiated hours
what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for grabbers to grow and perform at their best. we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

title: senior data scientist
description:
about us
99 group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across south east asia, specializing in digital property advertising. headquartered in singapore, it is currently operational in singapore and indonesia and employs over 500 employees. in singapore, 99 group operates 99.co and srx.com.sg, while in indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and rumah123.
join us and lead the real estate revolution!
we are looking for a mid/senior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing sql queries and ml models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. this person will be the go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the ceo — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
what you'll be doing:
collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
perform ad hoc analysis, report, a/b test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
what we're looking for:
at least 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or engineering roles.
strong sql skill and using python for software engineering, data wrangling and ml-modelling.
familiar with libraries such as pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, tensorflow or other similar ml/dl libraries.
strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
experience deploying models to production (apis, batch jobs, etc.).
excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
experience with big data platforms (spark, hadoop), cloud services (aws, gcp), and mlops.
are you ready to shape the future of real estate? join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
make your mark at 99 group. apply now!

title: manufacturing data analyst
description:
job description:
collect, analyze and interpret complex data to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for the business
collaborate closely with the director and senior leadership team to translate data into actionable recommendations
design and develop data visualisation, reports and dashboards to communicate insights effectively
support the implementation of data-driven decision making across the organization
proactively identify areas for process improvement and optimization
contribute to the development of data management and governance frameworks
job requirements:
bachelor degree in a quantitative field such as industrial engineering, statistics, or mathematics
proven experience as a data analyst or in a similar analytical role, preferably from manufacture industry 
strong proficiency in data collection, analysis and interpretation using tools such as sql, excel, powerbi or tableau
excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills, with the ability to translate complex data into clear and actionable insights

title: contract & data analyst
company: pt mineral alam abadi (mineral alam abadi group).
description:
job description:
collaborating with internal users to deliver well-defined scopes of work and commercial aspects, incorporating lessons learned from previous projects.
supporting and coordinating with other internal functions to ensure seamless contract processes.
maintaining a structured and organized system of both physical and digital contract records.
negotiating contract terms with internal and external business stakeholders.
developing and setting up tender schedules based on lead times stated in the contract requisition.
preparing, reviewing, and finalizing contractual agreements with a high level of accuracy.
ensuring compliance, discipline, and accuracy in record keeping and contract documentation.
leading regular contract performance reviews with major contractors to resolve issues, improve overall performance, and streamline the invoice and payment processes.
job requirement:
bachelor’s degree in a relevant field with a minimum of 1 year experience in contract administration or a related role.
strong attention to detail with the ability to spot errors and inconsistencies.
general understanding of legal and regulatory requirements involved in contracts.
ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
high integrity, hardworking, open-minded, innovative, agile, and honest.
strong planning and organizational skills with the ability to set and achieve realistic goals.
effective teamwork, with demonstrable ability to lead and coordinate with cross-functional teams.
fast response time and strong prioritization skills.
strong written and verbal communication skills, including proficiency in microsoft office (word, excel, powerpoint).
excellent analytical, problem-solving, and documentation skills.

title: data scientist - pricing
description:
it's fun to work in a company where people truly believe in what they're doing!
    job description
our data science team is responsible for solving complex problems and optimizing various aspects of traveloka’s business. you will get a wide range of exciting opportunities to bring impact by helping to make decisions at scale across our various business lines, and get to work with the brightest minds in the industry. join us in revolutionizing the travel industry through data!
key responsibilities:
collaborate with multiple business units to understand their challenges and goals.
translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights
develop, implement, and maintain data-driven solutions and systems
oversee and manage multiple data science projects, ensuring they meet the business objectives and are delivered on time.
  requirements
qualifications
bachelor’s degree in computer science, data science, statistics, or a related field. master's degree or higher preferred.
minimum of 3-5 years experience in data science or a related role.
excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
experience/familiarity with some of the followings:
causal inference
econometrics
simulation
optimization techniques
strong expertise in python and experience with ml/stats libraries (scikit-learn, lgbm, xgboost to name a few).
proficient in data manipulation and analysis using sql.
experience with cloud-based tech stack and docker. gcp will be preferred.
proven experience in managing data projects from inception to completion.
exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, including the ability to describe complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
good to have
experience in deep learning frameworks like pytorch or tensorflow.
experience with a/b testing and experimentation platforms.
experience with building and deploying machine learning models in a production environment.
  if you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

title: senior data scientist
description:
role and responsibilities
lead and mentor a team of data scientists to deliver cutting-edge analytics solutions that solve real business problems.
contribute to the deployment of ensemble machine learning methods, deep learning, and advanced optimization techniques to drill into our toughest challenges
leverage sharp research skills to test hypotheses and draw insights to support our goal of industry-leading, resource-efficient copper mining
utilize modern cloud technologies, such as microsoft azure, to deliver innovative analytics solutions at scale and visualize their impact for leadership
actively support the build, implementation, and maintenance of practical, analytical assets that effectively solve business problems using statistical methodologies
 requirements
minimum bachelor’s degree in a technical engineering or analytical field (statistics, mathematics, etc.) or related discipline.
minimum 5 years of experience in data science, including at least 3 years leading a data science team.
proven ability to manage, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of data scientists.
strong expertise in:
predictive modeling: linear/logistic regression, random forest, gradient boosting, etc.
time-series analysis, nlp, anomaly detection, survival analysis.
r and/or python for data analysis and modeling.
sql/hive environments and big data platforms.
hands-on experience with cloud-based machine learning tools (preferably azure).
a strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
proficient in english (verbal and written)
 you should have the following attributes:
you are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
you are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through python, r, sql and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
you are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
you have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
strong oral and written communication skills in english language.
 work environment
travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in jakarta.
occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 why join us?
you will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
working from home during covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
we offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large it environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
you will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

title: data scientist
description:
job descriptions: 
working closely with the international crif data analytics and local operations teams to deliver:
maintain existing and support development of new credit information 
and credit scoring products
development and maintenance of insightful statistics to internal and external clients
2. provide support to our sales team for the following:
provide technical knowledge such as credit scoring, credit analysis, etc.
assist in pre-sales activity such portfolio analysis and backtesting
customized analytics for internal and external clients
 job requirements:
minimum 3 years of experience in similar job functions – data management and analytics
master’s degree in economics, mathematics, or statistics
demonstrate proven proficiency in english
have the ability to plan, organize, and structure work.
understand sql for data management.
having exposure to python/r/pyspark and the ability to utilize ml methods for predictive analytics is a must.
skilled in productivity applications: excel, word, powerpoint
showcase good analytical, evaluative and information presentation skills.
showcase good written and oral communication skills both in english and bahasa.
have good interpersonal skills and team spirit as well as the ability to multitask.
experience in the financial industry, preferably fintech.
having some knowledge of credit risk analysis/management (credit lifecycle), preferably in personal loans.
experience in creating and maintaining reports/dashboards for internal/external clients is a plus.
mandarin is preferred.

title: senior data scientist (analytics), business platform
description:
company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the team
we drive innovation and operational excellence by turning data into actionable strategies that elevate the end-to-end experience for consumers, driver-partners, and merchant-partners. from optimizing transaction flows and platform efficiency to enhancing reliability, we strive to make grab the first choice, every time.
get to know the role
you will report to the product analytics manager, business platform and you'll have the unique opportunity to collaborate across disciplines (product, business, engineering, design, data science) to transform data into dynamic solutions. your insights will directly contribute to developing groundbreaking products and initiatives, setting new benchmarks for excellence. this isn't just any role; it's a chance to make a tangible impact on millions of lives every day.
the critical tasks you will perform
you will understand our requirements and outcomes to ensure data-driven decision-making.
you will conduct tailored analyses for specific products and operations, define critical business metrics, track them rigorously, and recommend continuous improvements.
you will frame business scenarios and propose features that impact critical business processes and decisions.
you will transform requirements into concise insights through reports, presentations, and dashboards, and consolidate data from multiple sources to create comprehensive views for decision-making.
you will develop data pipelines and custom data science models to solve identified problems.
you will launch a/b tests, analyze the results, and provide recommendations based on your findings.
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
you have at least 3-4 years of experience in data-related or quantitative fields such as analytics, science, statistics, or mathematics.
you are fluent with sql, python, r or other scripting/programming languages.
you are experienced in handling large datasets and maintaining complex extract, transform and load (etl) processes.
you have solid statistical knowledge and hands-on experience running and analysing controlled experiments.
you are proficient in creating dashboards using tableau, powerbi or other visualisation tools.
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through parental and birthday leave, and give back to your communities through love-all-serve-all (lasa) volunteering leave
we have a confidential grabber assistance programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our flexwork arrangements such as differentiated hours
what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for grabbers to grow and perform at their best. we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

title: machine learning engineer
description:
description:
a machine learning engineer train machine learning (ml) and deep learning (dl) models or implement pretrained models to perform visual recognition tasks, text generation, classification, etc.
design & implement ml/dl solutions and integrate them with various big data platforms and architectures.
creating and maintaining ml pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and product owners.
troubleshoot ml/dl model issues, including recommendations for retrain, revalidate, and improvements/optimization.
realize continuous integration (ci) and continuous deployment (cd) pipelines within ml/dl platforms.
requirements:
3 years of hands-on experience in building ml models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
good understanding of ml/dl framework such as jupyter notebook, anaconda, tensorflow, keras, scikit-learn, pytorch, mxnet, etc.
experience working with cloud services platform (aws or azure) to build ml/dl pipelines; training (gpu cuda), evaluating, deploying (sagemaker, docker container).
proficiency with python and basic libraries for ml such as scikit-learn and pandas
strong working knowledge of ml/dl algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
experience in working with llm for text and image generation
preferences:
having a working knowledge of ai agents is nice to have
experience with image processing/computer vision is nice to have
experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery(ci/cd) is nice to have
we will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., aws, azure, coursera)

title: senior data scientist
description:
about the role
as one of the prominent fintech players in indonesia, amartha provides financial services to underbanked women entrepreneurs in rural areas. we firmly believe that financial inclusion is key to building a sustainable economy that uplifts and supports the entire country.
we are currently seeking a junior data scientist to join our team. in this role, you will apply your skills in data wrangling and advanced problem-solving to tackle real business challenges. you will collaborate with a diverse range of stakeholders, including business experts, product leaders, and tech-savvy engineers.
you’ll also work alongside a team of exceptional data scientists with varied expertise, spanning data engineering, machine learning and ai engineering, data warehousing, and data analysis.
at amartha, we value your mindset and adaptability even more than your technical prowess.

responsibilities
talk with stakeholders from business, engineering, and product to understand their needs and design robust data solutions to answer their business needs
develop data pipelines to generate analytical data models from transactional data models
work with business stakeholders to clarify ambiguous business problems and attack them scientifically
extract and process raw data, then use sound and scientific method to analyze risks and opportunities and turn them to actionable insights
work with data engineer, engineer, product, and business teams to build scalable data products for millions of users
develop data science frameworks that can be used by fellow data scientists or non technical persons to simplify their analysis
design a data product roadmap and slice it to a small deliverables that can be released and test quickly
lead a small team of data scientists to tackle medium to large scale projects
influence the data driven culture in the company
requirements
a bachelor’s / master's degree in engineering or quantitative fields
experienced in extracting data from databases using sql queries
experienced in creating scripts for data analysis using python or r and presenting the results using effective data visualizations
ability to methodically tackle ambiguous business problems
ability to do rapid experimentations to effectively test business hypothesis
ability to use both business acumen and statistical methods to reduce raw data to actionable insights
ability to simplify and clearly communicate complex concepts to non-technical persons and to seamlessly communicate from strategic to operational levels
strong resolve in facing uncertainties and new challenges with the ability to think clearly under pressure
previous experience in implementing end-to-end machine learning in production is a plus
previous experience in building analytical solutions that scale to millions of users is a plus
at amartha, we are dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates diversity, ensures equity, and fosters inclusion. we believe that diverse perspectives—shaped by factors such as gender, age, race, ethnicity, education, culture, and life experiences—drive innovation and growth.
we actively welcome individuals from all backgrounds to join us in building an environment where everyone feels respected, valued, and empowered. our commitment is to provide equal opportunities and foster a sense of belonging that enables our employees to thrive and make meaningful contributions.

title: senior data scientist (product analytics)
description:
company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the team
at grab, we're committed to enhancing the consumer experience across southeast asia. our consumer experience team focuses on spurring user growth, retention, and engagement through strategies backed by data insights. we're looking for a senior data scientist (analytics) to join our team at our office in jakarta, indonesia, driving improvements in user experience through product experimentation, a/b testing, and in-depth research.
get to know the role
in this role, you will work closely with product managers to define hypotheses, design experiments, and deeply understand user needs, pain points, and business goals. you will act as a strategic partner throughout the product development lifecycle—offering analytical support from ideation to execution—and help prioritize features through data-driven insights. you will report to senior analytics manager.
the critical tasks you will perform
design and run a/b tests and quasi-experiments to evaluate the impact of product changes on key metrics like engagement, retention, and conversion.
analyze experiment results and generate actionable insights to guide product improvements.
conduct deep-dive user behavior analyses using statistical techniques and machine learning to uncover trends and root causes.
translate complex data into clear, strategic recommendations for product enhancements.
build and maintain intuitive dashboards to track product and feature performance in real time.
visualize data effectively to highlight trends, anomalies, and opportunities, enabling data-driven decisions across teams.
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
we are looking for someone with at least 3 years of experience in the product analytics space.
you have a bachelor's degree in computer science or data related fields
you are proficient in sql, python, and r for handling large datasets.
you have experience creating dashboards using tools like powerbi for informed decision-making.
you have advanced knowledge in statistical methodologies and machine learning to uncover insights. you can also apply these techniques to large datasets.
you have experience designing and implementing a/b tests and other experiment frameworks. you ca analyse results to derive actionable insights.
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through parental and birthday leave, and give back to your communities through love-all-serve-all (lasa) volunteering leave
we have a confidential grabber assistance programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our flexwork arrangements such as differentiated hours
what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for grabbers to grow and perform at their best. we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

title: data analyst
description:
key responsibilities:
1. analyze sales trends, channel performance, and distributor data across regions and product categories.
2. identify growth opportunities and underperforming areas based on quantitative insights.
3. design, build, and automate dashboards and sales performance reports using excel, power bi, tableau, or similar tools.
4. assist with demand forecasting and sales planning by using historical data and predictive models.
5. support the sales team with insights for setting targets and territory planning.
6. track product availability, stock turnover, and order fill rates at distributor and retail levels.
qualifications:
1. bachelor’s degree in business analytics, statistics, economics, data science, or a related field.
2. min 2 years of experience in data analysis, preferably within a trade sales or commercial environment.
3. proficient in excel (pivot tables, vlookup, advanced formulas), and experienced with bi tools (e.g., power bi, tableau).
4. strong sql skills and familiarity with erp/crm systems (sap, oracle, salesforce) is a plus.
5. solid understanding of sales kpis, trade marketing concepts, and retail distribution.
6. strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
7. ability to present complex data in a clear, actionable format.
8. strong communication skills to engage with both technical and non-technical teams.

title: data analyst
description:
posisi: data analyst – tiktok shop
lokasi: jakarta barat (full wfo)
tipe pekerjaan: full-time
mulai: segera

deskripsi pekerjaan:
kami mencari seorang data analyst penuh waktu yang memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang sistem kerja tiktok shop serta mampu mengolah dan menganalisis data e-commerce dengan efisien. posisi ini bertanggung jawab untuk memberikan wawasan berbasis data guna mendukung pertumbuhan performa toko di tiktok shop.

tanggung jawab:
- mengumpulkan dan mengelola data dari tiktok shop.
- menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan dalam format spreadsheet dan dashboard.
- menganalisis tren data untuk mendukung tim dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.
- berkoordinasi dengan tim internal (konten, operasional, kemitraan) untuk menyelaraskan data dan kemajuan kampanye.
- menyusun wawasan serta rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan performa kampanye.
- memastikan akurasi dan integritas data.
- memiliki pengetahuan tentang tiktok shop.

kualifikasi:
- memahami sistem tiktok shop (pengalaman terkait dengan tiktok shop lebih diutamakan).
- menguasai microsoft excel dan sql.
- memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data atau bidang sejenis.
- mampu mengolah dan menyajikan data dalam bentuk visualisasi sederhana (grafik, dashboard, chart).
- teliti, rapi, komunikatif, serta mampu bekerja baik dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
- mudah beradaptasi dan cepat belajar hal baru.
- menyukai tantangan.
- bersedia bekerja full wfo di jakarta barat dan dapat mulai segera.

title: senior growth data scientist
description:
company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the role
we are looking for a senior growth data scientist specializing in crm programs to join our dynamic team in jakarta, indonesia. you will use advanced analytics and machine learning techniques to improve growth strategies and improve our customer relationship management programs. reporting to the manager, you will be based in our jakarta office
the critical tasks you will perform
develop and implement data-driven strategies to enhance customer acquisition, retention, and engagement
design and conduct a/b tests and experiments to improve crm programs and marketing campaigns
build predictive models to forecast customer behavior and identify growth opportunities
analyze customer lifecycle data to obtain applicable insights and improve customer segmentation
collaborate with teams to translate complex analytical findings into clear, applicable recommendations
create dashboards and reports to communicate main performance metrics and trends
automate data processes to enhance efficiency and scalability
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
minimum bachelor's degree in data science, statistics, computer science, or a related field
5+ years of experience in data science, with a focus on growth analytics and crm
proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization techniques
expert-level programming skills in python, r, or sql
familiarity with crm software (salesforce or hubspot) and big data technologies like hadoop or spark
track record in designing and implementing a/b tests and experiments
in-depth knowledge of customer lifecycle analysis and growth marketing strategies
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.

what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for grabbers to grow and perform at their best. we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
text:
senior growth data scientist mathematics, statistics & information sciences (science & technology) company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the role
we are looking for a senior growth data scientist specializing in crm programs to join our dynamic team in jakarta, indonesia. you will use advanced analytics and machine learning techniques to improve growth strategies and improve our customer relationship management programs. reporting to the manager, you will be based in our jakarta office
the critical tasks you will perform
develop and implement data-driven strategies to enhance customer acquisition, retention, and engagement
design and conduct a/b tests and experiments to improve crm programs and marketing campaigns
build predictive models to forecast customer behavior and identify growth opportunities
analyze customer lifecycle data to obtain applicable insights and improve customer segmentation
collaborate with teams to translate complex analytical findings into clear, applicable recommendations
create dashboards and reports to communicate main performance metrics and trends
automate data processes to enhance efficiency and scalability
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
minimum bachelor's degree in data science, statistics, computer science, or a related field
5+ years of experience in data science, with a focus on growth analytics and crm
proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization techniques
expert-level programming skills in python, r, or sql
familiarity with crm software (salesforce or hubspot) and big data technologies like hadoop or spark
track record in designing and implementing a/b tests and experiments
in-depth knowledge of customer lifecycle analysis and growth marketing strategies
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through parental and birthday leave, and give back to your communities through love-all-serve-all (lasa) volunteering leave
we have a confidential grabber assistance programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our flexwork arrangements such as differentiated hours
what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for grabbers to grow and perform at their best. we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

description:
we are looking to hire a data analyst to join us. you will take responsibility for managing our master data set, developing reports, and assess potential risks. to do well in this role you need a very fine eye for detail, experience as a data analyst, and a deep understanding of the popular data analysis tools and databases.

bachelor’s degree from an accredited university in fmipa/ statistics/ actuarial.
proven work experience as a data analyst or business analyst

experience in methodologies and processes for managing large-scale databases.
high-level written and verbal communication skills.
fluent in english verbal and written.

title: data scientist lead
description:
#li-lp1
we are seeking a highly skilled and experienced data scientist lead to leverage large datasets for identifying opportunities in product and process optimization. the ideal candidate will utilize models to evaluate the effectiveness of various strategies. this role requires a strong background in data mining, data analysis, data tools, model building and implementation, algorithm development, and simulation execution. a proven track record of driving business results through data-driven insights and the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders and functional teams are essential. the successful candidate will be passionate about uncovering data-driven solutions and partnering with stakeholders to enhance business outcomes. strong management and leadership abilities are a must.
your main duties in flying with us:
collaborate with stakeholders to define data science related business requirements.
identify and automate the collection of valuable data sources.
develop predictive models and machine learning algorithms.
analyze data to identify patterns and trends, translating them into actionable insights (e.g., through tableau and presentations).create advanced analytics models to address business needs.
recognize business needs and formulate hypotheses accordingly.
establish plans and monitor team performance.
develop, manage, and evaluate the team to achieve desired results.
build ai/ml models and the capability to improve and fine-tune ai/ml models.
mandatory belongings that you must prepare:
minimum of 8 years of experience as a data scientist, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
bachelor's degree in computer science, statistics, mathematics, or a related quantitative field. master and phd’s degree is preferred.
solid understanding of data science and machine learning principles, with demonstrated experience in solving data science challenges.
experience working with diverse data types, including image, nlp, and time series data.
experience with productionalize llm and genai, adept in rag, mcp and llm fine tuning.
understanding of the data discovery process to generate business insights.
experience with cloud technology, preferably google cloud platform.
proficiency in programming, preferably python.
excellent communication and collaboration skills for working with cross-functional teams.
strong leadership skills.
creative, innovative, and possesses critical thinking abilities.

title: senior data scientist
description:
job description
a. model development and deployment
- design, build, and deploy machine learning models for credit scoring. perform risk evaluation and business impact analysis and making suggestion to risk counterparts.
- develop and perform testing on model implementation logics.
b. feature engineering and model improvement
- conduct analysis to improve model performance, through research in algorithms or feature engineering.
c. data analysis and insights
work along with risk counterparts to analysis portfolio and acquisition performance. fine tuning risk rule engines and drive improvement to implementation.
minimum qualifications
bachelor degree in computer science, mathematics, statistics, information system and/or other relevant major
min. 5 years experience as data science/data scientist. involve within the fintech or finance services industry and have an understanding of risk management would be an advantage
deep understanding in machine learning is a must
strong analytical thinking
proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models in a production environment

title: it data engineer specialist
description:
join our team as an it data engineer specialist and play a critical role in designing, optimizing, and maintaining our data transformation and warehousing processes. if you’re passionate about data, performance, and collaboration, this role is for you.
key responsibilities:
design, develop, and maintain data transformation processes to cleanse, transform, and aggregate data within the data warehouse.
optimize and streamline data workflows to ensure efficient processing and storage.
collaborate with data analysts and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and implement the right data transformations.
develop and maintain database schemas, tables, and views to support reporting and analytics needs.
implement data governance policies to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.
monitor and maintain system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize scalability and efficiency in the data warehouse and data pipelines.
qualifications:
minimum 3 years of experience in data engineering or a related field.
strong understanding of data transformation and warehousing concepts and have skill about python, bash linux, sql server, postgressql, docker, apache airflow
familiarity with data governance and security best practices.
excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
