title: it data engineer
description:
job description
1. designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines for etl processes and orchestration workflows.
2. creating and managing data visualization dashboards to support business decision-making.
3. performing data cleansing and validation to ensure data quality and reliability.
4. developing and maintaining simple web applications to facilitate data input processes.
5. collaborating closely with other it teams to ensure integrated and complementary system solutions.
job qualifications
1. minimum bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, data engineering, or a related field.
2. at least 2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in data engineering or a related domain.
3. proficient in core data engineering technologies such as apache airflow, sql, and python.
4. strong understanding and hands-on experience with etl processes and data orchestration.
5. excellent communication skills, with a proactive and collaborative work attitude.
6. willing to travel and work in different locations.
7. placement in tebet, south jakarta.

title: artificial intelligence
description:
job description
merancang dan membangun model berbasis computer vision untuk keperluan deteksi objek, klasifikasi, atau analisis citra lainnya.
mengembangkan pipeline digital image processing untuk preprocessing, peningkatan kualitas gambar, atau transformasi.
membuat dan mengelola api dengan flask, termasuk integrasi dengan sistem berbasis windows iis jika diperlukan.
mengelola vector database (milvus, chromadb, pinecone, dll) untuk menyimpan dan mencari embedding dari data visual atau teks.
melakukan deployment model secara local atau pada dedicated server, baik linux maupun windows.
troubleshooting performa dan kompatibilitas lintas sistem.
berkolaborasi dengan tim engineering lain untuk mengintegrasikan solusi ai dalam ekosistem aplikasi perusahaan.
qualification
lulusan s1 matematika/ilmu komputer/ilmu data, atau bidang terkait.
pengalaman mendalam dengan computer vision (yolo, opencv, dll) dan digital image processing.
mahir dalam python dan library pendukung seperti numpy, scikit-learn, pil, dll.
pengalaman membangun dan mengelola rest api menggunakan flask.
pengalaman menggunakan fastapi untuk api yang lebih efisien dan asinkron.
pengalaman bekerja pada sistem operasi linux dan windows (termasuk pemahaman iis untuk integrasi backend di windows).
pengalaman deployment model secara mandiri (on-premise). familiar dengan deployment menggunakan docker atau virtual environment.
familiar dengan penggunaan vector database untuk pencarian semantik (milvus, pinecone, chromadb, weaviate, dsb).
pengalaman bekerja minimum 1 tahun pada artificial intelligence
freshgraduate welcome for apply

title: data engineer
description:
design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable data pipelines on gcp using services such as bigquery, dataflow, cloud storage, pub/sub, and other relevant tools.
implement data quality monitoring processes and systems to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and reliability of production data.
acquire, aggregate, cleanse, and process structured and unstructured data from diverse internal and external sources.
optimise data workflows for performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness within the gcp ecosystem.
collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data needs and deliver solutions that enable actionable insights.
develop and maintain technical documentation, including data models, data flow diagrams, and pipeline specifications.
qualifications:
bachelor degree from computer science (informatics engineering)
having 2-3 years experience as data engineer in life insurance or financial services industry
can operate etl tools such as pentaho pdi
have skill in data querying (sql)
excellent in problem-solving and attention to detail

title: data analis
description:
tentang nirwana
kami adalah nirwana group,perusahaan retail modern yang didirikan pada 03 juli 2000 di ruteng, manggarai. saat ini, nirwana group mengelola head office, distribution centre, 1 toko utama nirwana pasaraya, dan 3 cabang nirwana mart, yang hadir lebih dekat dengan masyarakat. dengan visi terus memperluas jangkauan pelayanannya untuk mencapai target 8 cabang pada tahun 2029 yang tersebar di manggarai raya. kami telah berkontribusi dengan menciptakan lapangan kerja. hingga saat ini kami telah mempekerjakan 170 pekerja putra-putri manggarai serta menyediakan fasilitas belajar dan pengembangan diri untuk meningkatkan sumber daya manusia. kami pun ikut serta dalam membangun umkm manggarai.
tanggung jawab utama
mengumpulkan data yang akan diolah
membersihkan dan menyusun data
menganalisis tren penjualan, tren pembelian
melakukan analisis produk dan pelanggan
kualifilikasi
usia maksimal 40 tahun
pendidikan minimal d3 dan s1 statistik atau matematika murni
pengalaman minimal 1-2 tahun diposisi yang sama
mahir dalam microsoft excel (intermediate - advance),
mahir menggunakan phyton dan tableau menjadi poin plus
memiliki kemampuan mengumpulkan data, menganalisis data, dan membuat visialisasi data
memiliki logika yang bagus
mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik
bersedia ditempatkan di ruteng, manggarai
manfaat
remunerasi yang kompetitif dan tunjangan menarik.
lingkungan kerja yang mendukung, dengan kesempatan untuk pengembangan profesional.
bpjs kesehatan dan ketenagakerjaan
skema bonus tahunan berdasarkan kinerja.
cuti tahunan
thr
tentang pelita timur
pelita timur adalah perusahaan terkemuka di nusa tenggara timur yang bergerak di bidang perdagangan ritel grocery. selama lebih dari 25 tahun, kami telah membangun reputasi sebagai mitra terpercaya bagi pelanggan dan mitra bisnis kami. dengan komitmen pada inovasi, keunggulan operasional, dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul, kami terus memimpin pasar dan menciptakan nilai bagi para pemangku kepentingan.

jika anda tertarik untuk bergabung dengan tim kami yang dinamis dan berorientasi pada pertumbuhan, lamar sekarang dan jadikan karier anda lebih cemerlang bersama pelita timur.

title: analyst, data engineer
description:
business function
dbsi t&o is the backbone that supports the bank as the central of operations and technology. with the spirit of oneteam and pride! value, we serve institutional banking operations and consumer banking operations, manage customer centre and it, provide group procurement and corporate real estate, coordinate bank-wide business continuity management program and framework, and deliver service quality for digibank and ibg/gts. our technology & operations organization is a vital strategic partner to the business in providing competitive advantage that propels dbsi towards being the best bank for a better world (#b3w).
responsibilities
collaborate with regional team, business unit, support unit and other related party for any projects.
ensure user requirements on data needs are captured
develop scripts/tools to support data requirements and ingestion from bu/su
maintain good relationships between it and business, manage business expectations and negotiate compromise
requirements
minimum 4 years of relevant working experience
understand key data concepts, develop data set processes, techniques and considerations in machine learning and data analytics
training and relevant experience in one or more of the following areas \:
statistical modelling tools such as\: r, python, sas, etc
data manipulation using scripting languages like python or using etl tools
visual analytics technologies like tableau, qlikview, powerbi, etc
end-to-end analytics architecture, preferably with some working knowledge of big data stack
passion towards automation where appropriate and beneficial
unix shell scripting and knowledge of job scheduler
excellent understanding of technology life cycles and the concepts and practices required to build big data solutions
ability to understand and build re-usable data assets or features to enable downstream data science models to read and use

title: data analyst
description:
mengolah data harian yang mencakup data penjualan dan pemasaran sebagai pondasi dalam membangun insight dan informasi mingguan, bulanan, dan tahunan, ke dalam sebuah dashboard informasi visual
mengupdate kelengkapan informasi visual dalam dashboard berdasarkan kebutuhan bisnis
menyusun insight mingguan dari laporan kuantitatif dan kualitatif yang disampaikan dari semua toko setiap harinya
menyusun target sales, tc dan apc untuk channel offline dan online untuk bulan depan untuk setiap toko di setiap area untuk disampaikan kepada semua departemen di pertengahan bulan berjalan
membangun sensitivitas organisasi terhadap kebutuhan customer melalui riset pasar, di antaranya berbentuk survei customer online maupun pengambilan data kualitatif dengan melakukan interview kepada customer offline

title: junior data analyst
description:
core responsibilities:
-provide first-level (tier 1) support for data products (dashboards, reports, pipelines), including proactive monitoring, issue triaging, and documentation.
-conduct initial investigation and debugging of operational issues, and escalate to relevant stakeholders when needed.
-understand and translate business requirements into data deliverables by collaborating with internal team members and subject matter experts.
-support the maintenance and enhancement of existing dashboards, data models, and reporting pipelines.
-prepare and deliver routine reports and ad-hoc data requests in a timely and accurate manner.
-contribute to improving documentation, playbooks, and operational processes to enhance the scalability of our support model.
required qualifications:
bachelor’s or master’s degree in analytics, statistics, computer science, engineering, or a related field.
-1–3 years of work experience or multiple internships in analytics, business intelligence, or data science, preferably in a tech, internet, or direct-to-consumer company.
-proficient in sql for querying large and complex datasets.
-have foundation in etl (extract, transform, load) processes is a plus -hands-on experience with data visualization tools, preferably power bi (or tableau/data studio).
-strong attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and ability to work under pressure with minimal supervision.
-excellent communication skills—capable of conveying technical concepts to business audiences.
preferred qualifications:
-familiarity with big data tools such as spark, pyspark, or databricks.
-experience with large language models (llms) and how to leverage them to streamline analysis or operational tasks.
-exposure to business strategy or consulting roles is a plus.

title: manufacturing data analyst
description:
job description:
collect, analyze and interpret complex data to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for the business
collaborate closely with the director and senior leadership team to translate data into actionable recommendations
design and develop data visualisation, reports and dashboards to communicate insights effectively
support the implementation of data-driven decision making across the organization
proactively identify areas for process improvement and optimization
contribute to the development of data management and governance frameworks
job requirements:
bachelor degree in a quantitative field such as industrial engineering, statistics, or mathematics
proven experience as a data analyst or in a similar analytical role, preferably from manufacture industry 
strong proficiency in data collection, analysis and interpretation using tools such as sql, excel, powerbi or tableau
excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills, with the ability to translate complex data into clear and actionable insights

title: data analyst
description:
about us :
yuxi   jayatama  is  an  multi-channel  network (mcn) company  under  the sands group indonesia with 9 business units such as oppo, j&t express, j&t cargo, y.o.u, makuku, olike, jet commerce, fullmoon, tomoro cafe.
we provides services for brands in marketing planning, promotion, brand awareness, campaign and assisting in finding the right creators for brands.
in  less  than  1  year,  yuxi  have  achieved  several  significant milestones, such as number 1 mcn in mom and baby category on tiktok, top 3 mcn in tiktok, shopee mcn partner from october 2023 until now.

data analyst:

job responsibility: 
collect, consolidate, and manage data from tiktok affiliate, tap, shopee affiliate, and other e-commerce platforms to uncover performance trends, identify growth opportunities, and generate insights that drive strategic actions.
ensure data integrity, accuracy, and consistency across different sources.
build and automate dashboards to monitor performance metrics such as ctr, conversion rate, gmv, commission, and roi across each platform/channel, using google sheet or feishu
generate regular performance reports and provide relevant insights for all functions.
analyze sales trends, content performance, and campaign effectiveness to deliver strategic recommendations.
collaborate with creative, business development, and operations teams to identify analytics needs and growth opportunities.
provide ad hoc analysis based on stakeholder requests (e.g., specific campaign performance, creator content analysis, etc.).
job requirements:
fluency in english, both written and spoken, is required.
bachelor’s degree in statistics, mathematics, industrial engineering, computer science, or a related field.
minimum 1–2 years of experience as a data analyst or business analyst, preferably in digital, e-commerce, or mcn industries.
experienced in using google sheets or feishu (chinese google sheet alternative); familiarity with other analytical tools such as sql, power bi, tableau, or similar platforms is a strong advantage
proficient in data visualization and reporting.
familiarity with apis, data pipelines, and platform integrations. experience in navigating tiktok or shopee affiliate dashboards and extracting performance insights is a strong plus.
strong business acumen and the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.

title: it data analyst jr manager
description:
job description
develop, design, and maintain power bi reports and dashboards to support business needs.
analyze large datasets, identify trends, and provide actionable insights.
collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and provide data-driven solutions.
develop and manage etl processes using ssis or similar tools to ensure the smooth extraction, transformation, and loading of data.
perform data quality checks and troubleshoot any data issues.
automate reporting and improve efficiency in data processes.
provide support and training for team members on data tools and reporting best practices.
continuously improve reporting processes, automation, and system integration.
qualification
bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, mathematics, or a related field (preferred but not required)
minimum 2 years of experience working with power bi, including report/dashboard development and data visualization.
at least 1 year of experience using ssis or similar elt/etl tools for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
strong sql skills for querying and manipulating data from relational databases.
experience with data modeling, dax, and power query.
knowledge of data warehousing and data integration processes.
excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
ability to work independently and in a team environment.
experience with cloud platforms, ai/ml applications for data analysis and automation

title: data analyst
description:
tugas dan tanggung jawab:
mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan mengolah data.
melakukan analisis data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan strategis perusahaan.
menyusun laporan dan visualisasi data menggunakan tools seperti excel, sql, power bi, atau tableau.
mengidentifikasi tren, pola, dan insight dari data untuk meningkatkan efisiensi operasional atau kinerja bisnis.
bekerja sama dengan tim lintas fungsi (marketing, operasional, manajemen, dll.) untuk memahami kebutuhan data.
membuat model prediktif sederhana atau analisis statistik sesuai kebutuhan.
menyimpan dan mengelola database perusahaan dengan struktur yang rapi dan mudah diakses.
menyajikan hasil analisis kepada manajemen dalam bentuk laporan yang ringkas dan mudah dipahami.
kualifikasi:
pendidikan minimal s1 di bidang statistika, matematika, ilmu komputer, ekonomi, atau bidang terkait.
memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data (fresh graduate dipertimbangkan).
menguasai microsoft excel dan software analisis data.
mampu berpikir logis, analitis, dan memiliki perhatian terhadap detail.
mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim.
komunikatif dan mampu menjelaskan data secara jelas kepada pihak non-teknis.
keuntungan (opsional):
kesempatan berkembang dalam bidang analitik dan teknologi data.
lingkungan kerja yang kolaboratif dan dinamis.
tunjangan dan bonus berdasarkan performa.

title: data analyst
description:
key responsibilities:
1. analyze sales trends, channel performance, and distributor data across regions and product categories.
2. identify growth opportunities and underperforming areas based on quantitative insights.
3. design, build, and automate dashboards and sales performance reports using excel, power bi, tableau, or similar tools.
4. assist with demand forecasting and sales planning by using historical data and predictive models.
5. support the sales team with insights for setting targets and territory planning.
6. track product availability, stock turnover, and order fill rates at distributor and retail levels.
qualifications:
1. bachelor’s degree in business analytics, statistics, economics, data science, or a related field.
2. min 2 years of experience in data analysis, preferably within a trade sales or commercial environment.
3. proficient in excel (pivot tables, vlookup, advanced formulas), and experienced with bi tools (e.g., power bi, tableau).
4. strong sql skills and familiarity with erp/crm systems (sap, oracle, salesforce) is a plus.
5. solid understanding of sales kpis, trade marketing concepts, and retail distribution.
6. strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
7. ability to present complex data in a clear, actionable format.
8. strong communication skills to engage with both technical and non-technical teams.

title: lead data analyst
description:
about the role

pt tawada healthcare is seeking an exceptional data analyst to join our dynamic team in west jakarta. as a data analyst, you will play a crucial role in extracting, analysing and interpreting complex data sets to drive informed business decisions and creating strategic dashboards for the company's business development & strategy purposes.
what you'll be doing
collect, organise and analyse large data sets from multiple sources
develop and implement data models and reporting dashboards to provide actionable insights
translate data into meaningful and understandable reports and presentations
collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve business challenges
stay up-to-date with the latest data analysis tools and techniques
continuously improve data quality, processes and workflows
what we're looking for
bachelor's or master's degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, mathematics, computer science or a related discipline
minimum 5 years of experience as a data analyst or in a similar role
proficient in data manipulation, analysis and visualisation using tools such as sql, python, excel, tableau or power bi
strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to drive insights from complex data sets
experience in communicating technical information to non-technical stakeholders
familiarity with data warehousing, data mining and data modelling concepts
exceptional attention to detail and a keen eye for identifying data anomalies

we are seeking a talented data analyst to join our dynamic production team at pt panasonic gobel energy indonesia (pecgi) in cibitung district, bekasi, west java. as a fulltime employee, you will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision making and optimising our production processes.

develop and maintain reporting dashboards to provide real-time visibility into production performance
collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions that enhance efficiency and productivity

attention to detail and a keen interest in continuous improvement

- competitive remuneration package

- collaborative and supportive team environment

title: junior data analyst
description:
kami sedang mencari junior data analyst yang teliti, analitis, dan memiliki kemampuan kuat dalam mengolah data menggunakan microsoft excel. posisi ini cocok untuk kamu yang memiliki ketertarikan terhadap angka, mampu menyajikan data menjadi informasi yang berguna, dan ingin mengembangkan karier di bidang analitik.
kualifikasi:
pendidikan minimal s1 dari jurusan statistik, matematika, teknik, ekonomi, atau jurusan terkait.
memiliki kemampuan lanjutan dalam microsoft excel (vlookup/xlookup, pivot table, if/sumifs, conditional formatting, data validation, dll).
mampu mengelola dan membersihkan data (data cleaning).
memiliki kemampuan analisis dan problem solving yang baik.
teliti, detail-oriented, dan mampu bekerja dengan data dalam jumlah besar.
komunikatif dan mampu menyampaikan hasil analisis dalam bentuk yang mudah dipahami.

title: data analyst associate
description:
company description
about grab and our workplace
grab is southeast asia's leading superapp. from getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. in grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of technology and ai to deliver the mission of driving southeast asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
job description
get to know the team
you will join a dynamic team reporting to the senior manager of finance data strategy. we are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. we prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.
get to know the role
as a data analyst, finance product & data integration at grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. you will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with finance, business teams, and the data engineering team. your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. this role is based on-site in our jakarta office.
the critical tasks you will perform
you will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft sql scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
you will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
you will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (etl) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
you will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
you will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
you will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.
qualifications
what essential skills you will need
bachelor's degree in data analytics, business analytics, finance, economics, statistics, computer science or a related field.
minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area.
must be fluent in sql language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data.
exposure in financial reporting, oracle erp and data reconciliation.
exposure in etl tool, tableau, python is added advantage.
familiar with the user interface and navigation of power bi dashboards.
additional information
life at grab
we care about your well-being at grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
we have your back with term life insurance and comprehensive medical insurance.
with grabflex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through parental and birthday leave, and give back to your communities through love-all-serve-all (lasa) volunteering leave
we have a confidential grabber assistance programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our flexwork arrangements such as differentiated hours
what we stand for at grab
we are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse grabbers to grow and perform at their best. as an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

description:

required skills and competencies:
bachelor’s degree from an accredited university in fmipa/ statistics/ actuarial.
proven work experience as a data analyst or business analyst
ability to work with stakeholders to assess potential risks.
experience in methodologies and processes for managing large-scale databases.
high-level written and verbal communication skills.
fluent in english verbal and written.

title: sales data analyst (commission & data reporting) - karawaci
description:
about the role

we are seeking a talented sales data analyst to join our team at pt. lippo karawaci tbk'. as a sales data analyst, you will be responsible for analysing and reporting on our sales data using dax power bi, with a focus on commission tracking and data reporting. this is a full-time position based in tangerang banten.
what you'll be doing
design and maintain power bi dashboards for external divisions to gain deeper analysis with interactive and informative dashboards.
developing and maintaining comprehensive sales reporting and analytics to track commission structures and key performance metrics using power bi
analysing sales data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement
preparing regular sales reports and presentations for management and key stakeholders
collaborating with the sales team to understand their data needs and provide valuable insights
implementing data quality assurance processes to ensure the integrity of sales data
identifying and implementing process improvements to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of sales data reporting
what we're looking for
bachelor degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, economics, mathematic, or computer science
minimum 3 years of experience in a sales data analysis or reporting role
proficient in data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using tools like excel, sql, and power bi
strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills to uncover insights from data
excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey complex data-driven insights
familiarity with sales commission structures and data reporting in the property industry is a plus
what we offer

at pt. lippo karawaci tbk', we are committed to providing our employees with a supportive and rewarding work environment. in addition to a competitive salary, we offer a range of benefits, including:
comprehensive healthcare coverage
generous annual leave and sick leave entitlements
opportunities for career advancement and professional development
collaborative and inclusive company culture

title: data analyst
description:
posisi: data analyst – tiktok shop
lokasi: jakarta barat (full wfo)
tipe pekerjaan: full-time
mulai: segera

deskripsi pekerjaan:
kami mencari seorang data analyst penuh waktu yang memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang sistem kerja tiktok shop serta mampu mengolah dan menganalisis data e-commerce dengan efisien. posisi ini bertanggung jawab untuk memberikan wawasan berbasis data guna mendukung pertumbuhan performa toko di tiktok shop.

tanggung jawab:
- mengumpulkan dan mengelola data dari tiktok shop.
- menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan dalam format spreadsheet dan dashboard.
- menganalisis tren data untuk mendukung tim dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.
- berkoordinasi dengan tim internal (konten, operasional, kemitraan) untuk menyelaraskan data dan kemajuan kampanye.
- menyusun wawasan serta rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan performa kampanye.
- memastikan akurasi dan integritas data.
- memiliki pengetahuan tentang tiktok shop.

kualifikasi:
- memahami sistem tiktok shop (pengalaman terkait dengan tiktok shop lebih diutamakan).
- menguasai microsoft excel dan sql.
- memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data atau bidang sejenis.
- mampu mengolah dan menyajikan data dalam bentuk visualisasi sederhana (grafik, dashboard, chart).
- teliti, rapi, komunikatif, serta mampu bekerja baik dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
- mudah beradaptasi dan cepat belajar hal baru.
- menyukai tantangan.
- bersedia bekerja full wfo di jakarta barat dan dapat mulai segera.

pendidikan minimal s1 dari jurusan akuntansi atau management akuntansi.
lulusan baru dipersilakan melamar, namun memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun lebih disukai.
mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dalam bahasa inggris, lisan maupun tulisan.

title: inventory, pricing, profitability data analyst
description:
company description
viahart was founded in 2010. we are an innovative consumer products company. we design, manufacture, and distribute consumer products ranging from educational toys & sporting goods to cell phone & ai-powered electronic accessories. we also offer innovative logistics and manufacturing services. because we sell worldwide and make our products in different countries (not just china), we’ve built a base to navigate tariffs and changes in global trade. our business has been featured in the wall street journal, on television (cnbc and nbc), and in the new york times. while we rebuild our main site, you can learn more about us through our brand websites:
http://brainflakes.com
http://tigerharttoys.com
http://wholesaleeducationaltoys.com
please note that we check 3 work references (must be your supervisor or manager) and do background checks to make sure that we only hire good honest, hardworking, smart people.
job responsibilities
forecasting sales and inventory for purchasing
optimizing our inventory across multiple locations
monitoring our sales vs. forecasts and seasonality patterns
determining the root cause of inventory discrepancies
pricing our products in the us, for retail stores, and for international sales
checking the algorithms, calculations, and logic of our in-house custom built software (spreadsheet formulas required, programming is not)
commenting and explaining any (spreadsheet) code or algorithms you write
monitoring the profitability of our products
simplifying the logic in our software both in our spreadsheets and with our developer
building data dashboards
logging data
using data to determine causality and identify issues that need our attention
updating process documents (sop) so others know how to use the analysis and systems you have built
skills required
spoken english may be basic as long as communication is effective
strong mathematical skills
proficiency with spreadsheet formulas (google sheets, excel)
ability to understand the logic of software systems (coding not required, except for formulas)
ability to use ai tools effectively, using reasoning and strong verification skills
love numbers and be able to identify the relationship between them and what is happening the real world
high attention of detail and strong sense of responsibility for the quality of your work
self-motivated and able to work independently
stable internet and power supply
location
this role starts out remote but will transition to an in-office position in jakarta. we aim to create a work setup that is reasonable and sustainable for the long term.
you must be able to join our semi-weekly 9 am texas time meeting when needed.
compensation and benefits
this role is based in jakarta, but you will be paid in us dollars.
monthly salary range: usd $495-$660 (approximately idr7,970,000–idr10,630,000)
you will be paid every 2 weeks
this is a full-time job with 40 hours of good work per week on average
bonuses are given at the beginning of every february based on merit. these range from 0% to 15% of yearly salary.
10 working days of paid time off (aka 2 weeks) will be offered. you will get your vacation after a 3 month probationary period.
the us holidays of memorial day, july 4th, labor day, thanksgiving, christmas day, and new years day are paid holidays. they are not deducted from your vacation.

title: data analyst – pricing staff
description:
key responsibilities:
collect, process, and maintain internal and competitor data sets.
analyze data trends to support strategic pricing decisions.
develop and maintain dashboards to monitor business performance and achievement.
review program and pricing submissions from each operational area.
analyze and recommend pricing strategies for vip and key customers.
calculate and track internal operational costs related to pricing programs.
job requirements:
bachelor’s degree in statistics, mathematics, industrial engineering, or a related field.
proficient in microsoft excel (including pivottables, functions, and data visualization); experience with excel macros/vba is a strong plus.
strong programming skills in python for data processing and automation.
excellent analytical thinking with attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines.

title: data analyst
description:
job descriptions:
develop, implement, and maintain leading-edge analytical systems, taking complex problems and building simple frameworks
identify trends and opportunities for growth through the analysis of complex data sets
evaluate organizational methods and provide source-to-target mapping and information model specification documents for data sets
create best practice reports based on data mining, analysis, and visualization
evaluate internal systems for efficiency, issues, and inaccuracies, and develop and maintain protocols for handling, processing, and cleaning data
requirements:
bachelor's degree in information systems, statistics or related major from reputable university with min. 3.00 gpa
min. 2 years working experience as revenue analyst (from hospital or hotel background will be an added advantage)
strong research and analysis skills
proficient in excel and understand basic sql server query

title: machine learning engineer
description:
description:
a machine learning engineer train machine learning (ml) and deep learning (dl) models or implement pretrained models to perform visual recognition tasks, text generation, classification, etc.
design & implement ml/dl solutions and integrate them with various big data platforms and architectures.
creating and maintaining ml pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and product owners.
troubleshoot ml/dl model issues, including recommendations for retrain, revalidate, and improvements/optimization.
realize continuous integration (ci) and continuous deployment (cd) pipelines within ml/dl platforms.
requirements:
3 years of hands-on experience in building ml models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
good understanding of ml/dl framework such as jupyter notebook, anaconda, tensorflow, keras, scikit-learn, pytorch, mxnet, etc.
experience working with cloud services platform (aws or azure) to build ml/dl pipelines; training (gpu cuda), evaluating, deploying (sagemaker, docker container).
proficiency with python and basic libraries for ml such as scikit-learn and pandas
strong working knowledge of ml/dl algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
experience in working with llm for text and image generation
preferences:
having a working knowledge of ai agents is nice to have
experience with image processing/computer vision is nice to have
experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery(ci/cd) is nice to have
we will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., aws, azure, coursera)

title: data scientist
description:
about us
99 group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across south east asia, specializing in digital property advertising. headquartered in singapore, it is currently operational in singapore and indonesia and employs over 500 employees. in singapore, 99 group operates 99.co and srx.com.sg, while in indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and rumah123.
join us and lead the real estate revolution!
we are looking for a junior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing sql queries and ml models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. this person will be learning the ropes to be a go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the ceo — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
what you'll be doing:
collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
perform ad hoc analysis, report, a/b test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
what we're looking for:
strong sql skill and using python for software engineering, data wrangling and ml-modelling.
familiar with libraries such as pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, tensorflow or other similar ml/dl libraries.
strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
are you ready to shape the future of real estate? join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
make your mark at 99 group. apply now!

title: it data scientist
description:
deskripsi pekerjaan
merencanakan, merancang dan mengimplementasikan arsitektur vector database data yang efisien dan scalable.
memelihara dan import data ke vector database untuk mendukung ml training proses
mengoptimalkan performa basis data untuk mendukung analisis data yang cepat dan akurat.
mengembangkan dan fine-tune ai/ml model sesuai dengan parameter yang ditentukan.
berkoordinasi dengan tim pengembangan dan analisis untuk memahami dan memenuhi kebutuhan data.
merancang dan membuat kerangka kerja tata kelola ai/ml (ai governance), termasuk standar pengembangan, mlops practices, dan kebijakan penggunaan ai yang bertanggung jawab.
melakukan troubleshooting dan pemeliharaan sistem data untuk memastikan ketersediaan dan keandalan.
mendokumentasikan proses dan prosedur terkait pengelolaan data.
kualifikasi
diutamakan sarjana manajemen informatika/teknik informasi.

title: machine learning
description:
deskripsi
kami mencari machine learning / nlp data engineer yang berpengalaman untuk mendukung pengembangan solusi analitik cerdas pada proyek berbasis business intelligence (bi). posisi ini akan fokus pada pengembangan pipeline data, pemodelan nlp, riset model ml, serta integrasi insight prediktif ke dalam dashboard dan laporan bi.
job responsibilities
mendesain dan membangun data pipeline untuk pemrosesan teks dan data terstruktur/semi-terstruktur.
mengembangkan, menguji, dan menyempurnakan model machine learning dan nlp sesuai kebutuhan bisnis.
melakukan riset model dan evaluasi algoritma terbaru untuk meningkatkan performa sistem.
membangun model nlp seperti text classification, sentiment analysis, topic modeling, dan named entity recognition (ner).
mengintegrasikan output model ke dalam tools bi seperti power bi, tableau, atau dashboard internal.
bekerja sama dengan tim bi dan data analyst untuk menyajikan insight dalam bentuk visual yang mudah dipahami.
mengoptimalkan model agar dapat dideploy secara efisien di cloud (azure, aws, atau gcp).
menjaga kualitas data dan memastikan skalabilitas sistem analitik.
requirement
gelar s1/s2 di bidang ilmu komputer, data science, matematika, statistik, atau bidang terkait.
pengalaman 2–5 tahun dalam ml/nlp/data engineering.
menguasai pemrograman dengan python, khususnya libraries seperti:
pandas, numpy untuk data processing
scikit-learn, xgboost, lightgbm untuk machine learning
spacy, nltk, transformers (hugging face) untuk nlp
memahami algoritma nlp seperti:
tf-idf, word embeddings (word2vec, glove, bert)
text classification, clustering, topic modeling (lda)
pengalaman membangun dan mengelola etl pipeline dan workflow otomatis (misal dengan airflow, prefect, atau azure data factory).
familiar dengan penggunaan dan query sql/nosql databases.
pengalaman bekerja dengan power bi atau tools bi lain, terutama dalam mengintegrasikan hasil analisis/ml ke visualisasi.
pengalaman dengan cloud platform (azure ml, aws sagemaker, gcp ai platform).
kemampuan analisis kuat, komunikatif, dan terbiasa bekerja lintas fungsi dengan tim business dan engineer

title: ai developer
description:
mendesain, mengembangkan, dan mengimplementasikan model machine learning (ml) dan natural language processing (nlp).
membangun aplikasi dan layanan ai menggunakan alat seperti python atau sejenisnya.
memimpin siklus pengembangan ai secara menyeluruh
mengoptimalkan algoritma untuk performa, akurasi, dan skalabilitas dari model ai
mengintegrasikan model ai ke dalam aplikasi menggunakan api, kerangka kerja, dan platform yang sesuai.
memastikan kesesuaian model ai terhadap kepatuhan akan peraturan pemerintah (mematuhi kebijakan dan hukum indonesia, khususnya uu ite)
 kualifikasi pekerjaan :
pendidikan: minimal s1 di bidang informatika, computer science, matematika, telekomunikasi atau bidang terkait.
pengalaman: minimal 2 tahun di bidang machine learning/ai engineering.
kemampuan teknis :
pemrograman: python (wajib), ai, machine learning
nlp: familiar dengan llm (misalnya open ai, cohere, huggingface) dan text summarization
computer vision : pengalaman dengan model deteksi objek, ocr, atau image segmentation.
pengalaman membuat rest api atau integrasi model ai ke aplikasi (chatgpt, whisper).
problem solving yang kuat dan kritis serta memiliki etika kerja yang tinggi
mampu bekerja mandiri dan dalam tim lintas departemen

title: it data engineer
description:
job description
1. designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines for etl processes and orchestration workflows.
2. creating and managing data visualization dashboards to support business decision-making.
3. performing data cleansing and validation to ensure data quality and reliability.
4. developing and maintaining simple web applications to facilitate data input processes.
5. collaborating closely with other it teams to ensure integrated and complementary system solutions.
job qualifications
1. minimum bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, data engineering, or a related field.
2. at least 2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in data engineering or a related domain.
3. proficient in core data engineering technologies such as apache airflow, sql, and python.
4. strong understanding and hands-on experience with etl processes and data orchestration.
5. excellent communication skills, with a proactive and collaborative work attitude.
6. willing to travel and work in different locations.
7. placement in tebet, south jakarta.

title: senior data scientist
description:
about us
99 group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across south east asia, specializing in digital property advertising. headquartered in singapore, it is currently operational in singapore and indonesia and employs over 500 employees. in singapore, 99 group operates 99.co and srx.com.sg, while in indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and rumah123.
join us and lead the real estate revolution!
we are looking for a mid/senior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing sql queries and ml models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. this person will be the go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the ceo — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
what you'll be doing:
collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
perform ad hoc analysis, report, a/b test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
what we're looking for:
at least 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or engineering roles.
strong sql skill and using python for software engineering, data wrangling and ml-modelling.
familiar with libraries such as pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, tensorflow or other similar ml/dl libraries.
strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
experience deploying models to production (apis, batch jobs, etc.).
excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
experience with big data platforms (spark, hadoop), cloud services (aws, gcp), and mlops.
are you ready to shape the future of real estate? join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
make your mark at 99 group. apply now!

title: ai developer specialist
description:
ai developer specialist has the responsibility to design, build, and implement artificial intelligence models and systems that support our business goals. you will be responsible for developing machine learning pipelines, integrating ai solutions into applications, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact ai capabilities.
job description:
. design, develop, and implement machine learning (ml), deep learning (dl), and natural language processing (nlp) models.
. build ai applications and services using tools like python, tensorflow, pytorch, or similar.
. lead end-to-end ai development lifecycle: data collection, model training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring.
. work closely with data scientists, data engineers, and software developers to integrate ai models into production environments.
. optimize algorithms for performance, accuracy, and scalability.
. analyze large datasets to extract insights and identify opportunities for automation or augmentation.
. integrate ai models into applications using appropriate apis, frameworks, and platforms.
. stay updated on the latest ai/ml research, tools, and trends to ensure the team applies cutting-edge techniques.
. ensure model explainability, fairness, and compliance with data regulations (comply with policy and indonesian law, especially uu ite).
requirement:
. bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, data science or related field.
. experience with large language models (llms), generative ai, or reinforcement learning.
. experience with data annotation tools and synthetic data generation.
. experience working with datasets and data analysis tools (e.g., pandas, numpy).
. 3+ years of experience in ai/ml development, with at least 2 years in a senior role.
. proficiency in python and major ai/ml libraries: tensorflow, pytorch, scikit-learn, etc.
. solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering best practices.
. experience with cloud platforms (aws, gcp, or azure) and mlops tools (mlflow, airflow, docker, kubernetes).
. strong knowledge of model evaluation, tuning, and deployment.
. eagerness to learn and grow in the ai/ml domain.

title: cloud ai/ml engineer
description:
job description:
- design, build, and optimize machine learning models for real-world applications
- hands-on coding: write clean, efficient, and scalable code for ai pipelines and deployments.
- translate business problems into ai solutions, from prototype to production.
- implement and integrate ai models into business systems using cloud platforms (aws, gcp, azure) or on-premise.
- work with structured/unstructured data, develop pipelines, and ensure data readiness for ai applications.

title: artificial intelligence
description:
job description
merancang dan membangun model berbasis computer vision untuk keperluan deteksi objek, klasifikasi, atau analisis citra lainnya.
mengembangkan pipeline digital image processing untuk preprocessing, peningkatan kualitas gambar, atau transformasi.
membuat dan mengelola api dengan flask, termasuk integrasi dengan sistem berbasis windows iis jika diperlukan.
mengelola vector database (milvus, chromadb, pinecone, dll) untuk menyimpan dan mencari embedding dari data visual atau teks.
melakukan deployment model secara local atau pada dedicated server, baik linux maupun windows.
troubleshooting performa dan kompatibilitas lintas sistem.
berkolaborasi dengan tim engineering lain untuk mengintegrasikan solusi ai dalam ekosistem aplikasi perusahaan.
qualification
lulusan s1 matematika/ilmu komputer/ilmu data, atau bidang terkait.
pengalaman mendalam dengan computer vision (yolo, opencv, dll) dan digital image processing.
mahir dalam python dan library pendukung seperti numpy, scikit-learn, pil, dll.
pengalaman membangun dan mengelola rest api menggunakan flask.
pengalaman menggunakan fastapi untuk api yang lebih efisien dan asinkron.
pengalaman bekerja pada sistem operasi linux dan windows (termasuk pemahaman iis untuk integrasi backend di windows).
pengalaman deployment model secara mandiri (on-premise). familiar dengan deployment menggunakan docker atau virtual environment.
familiar dengan penggunaan vector database untuk pencarian semantik (milvus, pinecone, chromadb, weaviate, dsb).
pengalaman bekerja minimum 1 tahun pada artificial intelligence
freshgraduate welcome for apply

title: senior ai engineer
description:
job description summary :
drive technological innovation while managing teams and contributing to strategic business growth. having a strong technical foundation in ai/ml, computer vision, and cutting-edge ai techniques, coupled with leadership acumen and the ability to identify business opportunities that leverage ai solutions.
 job description :
• perform research and innovation efforts in developing cutting-edge vision transformer models, self-supervised learning, and other advanced ai techniques for computer vision challenges. 
• design, develop and deploy algorithms for tasks like object detection, classification, segmentation, and enhancing satellite imagery resolution for agricultural insights. 
• analyze and preprocess large-scale datasets, utilizing statistical methods, data augmentation, and visualization tools to improve model performance and provide actionable insights.
• collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and create scalable ai-driven solutions.       • experiment with novel computer vision techniques, including vision transformer-based models, self-supervised learning models, and model distillation (student-teacher models), to identify the best solutions for specific ai use cases, ensuring the highest performance for each application.                                                                                               • optimize and deploy inference models on edge platforms such as smartphones and raspberry pi using tensorflow lite, openvino, and tensorrt, on real-time ai applications.                                                                            • build and train models using advanced computer vision frameworks for industrial applications.
 • develop ai-driven control systems and integrate models with hardware for automation in agricultural processes, including activity tracking systems to monitor sop compliance. 
• implement knowledge management solutions using large language models (llms) for document search and retrieval, ensuring data privacy.
• ensure quality assurance and compliance of ai models, performing rigorous testing and documentation of research findings, algorithms, and model architecture
 job requirement :
master’s degree in computer science, data science, or a related field with a strong focus on machine learning, computer vision, or artificial intelligence.
proven experience (> 4 years) in ai/ml development, with a track record of delivering ai-driven products or solutions.
proven experience in managing ai teams and leading aifocused projects. 
proficiency in tensorflow, pytorch, and strong programming skills in python or other relevant languages/frameworks. 
in-depth understanding of convolutional neural networks (cnns), attention mechanisms, and hands-on experience with vision transformers architectures, self-supervised learning, and model distillation techniques. •
strong foundation in statistical analysis, data manipulation, visualization techniques, remote sensing/satellite imagery.
experience integrating ai-driven control systems with hardware, using devices like arduino and raspberry pi. 
knowledge of deploying machine learning models in production environments and cloud platforms like aws, gcp, or azure. 
expertise in handling large-scale datasets and distributed training on multi-gpu setups 
in-depth knowledge of large language models (llms), such as gpt or bert, and their use in natural language processing tasks. experience in fine-tuning and deploying llms while ensuring data privacy and security compliance
publications in reputable conferences/journals highlighting contributions to the field of computer vision, generative ai and transformer-based architectures. 
experience with devops practices, continuous integration, and data privacy regulations. 
knowledge of palm oil industry for upstream, midstream or/and downstream is an added advantage.
 "our company has never levied any fees for the recruitment process nor has it required to order tickets and accommodation through a certain travel agent or certain person"

title: it data engineer specialist
description:
join our team as an it data engineer specialist and play a critical role in designing, optimizing, and maintaining our data transformation and warehousing processes. if you’re passionate about data, performance, and collaboration, this role is for you.
key responsibilities:
design, develop, and maintain data transformation processes to cleanse, transform, and aggregate data within the data warehouse.
optimize and streamline data workflows to ensure efficient processing and storage.
collaborate with data analysts and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and implement the right data transformations.
develop and maintain database schemas, tables, and views to support reporting and analytics needs.
implement data governance policies to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.
monitor and maintain system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize scalability and efficiency in the data warehouse and data pipelines.
qualifications:
minimum 3 years of experience in data engineering or a related field.
strong understanding of data transformation and warehousing concepts and have skill about python, bash linux, sql server, postgressql, docker, apache airflow
familiarity with data governance and security best practices.
excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

title: ai implementation specialist (artificial intelligence)
description:
pt. trimitra putra mandiri is looking for a highly motivated ai implementation specialist to help integrate artificial intelligence solutions across various business processes. you will play a key role in bridging operational needs with practical, efficient ai technologies.
key responsibilities:
identify opportunities for ai implementation across departments (customer service, operations, finance, etc.).
utilize ai tools such as chatgpt, gemini, notion ai, and others to improve workflow efficiency.
build and manage automation workflows using platforms like n8n, zapier, or make.com.
integrate systems using apis (crm, erp, email, google sheets, etc.).
assist teams in using ai for data analysis, reporting, and decision-making.
provide basic training and create documentation to ensure other teams can use the implemented solutions effectively.
troubleshoot and optimize existing ai and automation systems.
qualifications:
minimum d3/bachelor’s degree in computer science, information systems, or a related field.
proven experience with automation platforms such as n8n (required).
ability to write simple scripts in javascript, python, or basic node.js (optional).
strong understanding of rest api concepts and integration.
familiar with modern ai tools (chatgpt, gemini, copilot, notion ai, etc.).
able to think systematically and communicate effectively with non-technical teams.
quick learner and adaptable to new technologies.
experience building ai-powered chatbots or auto-reply systems.
familiar with data visualization tools like google data studio, power bi, or similar dashboards.
knowledge of basic databases (mysql, airtable, or google sheets).

title: data scientist
description:
job descriptions: 
working closely with the international crif data analytics and local operations teams to deliver:
maintain existing and support development of new credit information 
and credit scoring products
development and maintenance of insightful statistics to internal and external clients
2. provide support to our sales team for the following:
provide technical knowledge such as credit scoring, credit analysis, etc.
assist in pre-sales activity such portfolio analysis and backtesting
customized analytics for internal and external clients
 job requirements:
minimum 3 years of experience in similar job functions – data management and analytics
master’s degree in economics, mathematics, or statistics
demonstrate proven proficiency in english
have the ability to plan, organize, and structure work.
understand sql for data management.
having exposure to python/r/pyspark and the ability to utilize ml methods for predictive analytics is a must.
skilled in productivity applications: excel, word, powerpoint
showcase good analytical, evaluative and information presentation skills.
showcase good written and oral communication skills both in english and bahasa.
have good interpersonal skills and team spirit as well as the ability to multitask.
experience in the financial industry, preferably fintech.
having some knowledge of credit risk analysis/management (credit lifecycle), preferably in personal loans.
experience in creating and maintaining reports/dashboards for internal/external clients is a plus.
mandarin is preferred.

title: data engineer
description:
responsibilities :
create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture
assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.
identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
 build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using sql and on-prem/ cloud technologies.
build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics
qualifications :
2-4 years of experience as a data engineer.
advanced working sql knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (sql) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.
etl tools knowledge is required.
experience building and optimizing big data pipelines, architectures and data sets.
experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
 strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.
build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.
a successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.

title: senior machine learning engineer
description:
company description
pt appfuxion consulting indonesia is a leading provider of digital solutions and software testing services to various industries in the asia-pacific region, including banking, insurance, retail, telecommunication, and hospitality. with a focus on delivering high-quality and innovative digital solutions, we have built a team of 500 skilled professionals who are experienced in software blueprint, architecture, process automation, quality assurance, and project management. our customer-centric approach ensures that we are a natural extension of our clients' teams, delivering the right digital solutions on time and reducing project complexity.
role description
this is a full-time on-site role for a senior machine learning engineer located in tangerang. as a senior machine learning engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing machine learning models, utilizing pattern recognition, neural networks, and algorithms. you will work closely with the team to analyze data, develop statistical models, and improve existing machine learning algorithms. in this role, you will also be responsible for evaluating and integrating new technologies, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful deployment of machine learning solutions.
qualifications
strong knowledge and experience in pattern recognition, computer science, nlp, generative ai, and neural networks
hands-on experience in fine-tuning llm llama model
hands-on in prompt engineering
proficiency in statistics, algorithms, and data analysis
experience in developing and implementing machine learning models
ability to evaluate and integrate new technologies
excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
strong programming skills, preferably in python or r
experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries, such as tensorflow or pytorch
knowledge of natural language processing and deep learning is a plus
bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, statistics, or a related field

description:

minimum 1 year of experience as a data engineer.
proven experience with etl tool setup and usage, especially informatica; talend is a plus.
experience in building and maintaining data warehouses.

collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business teams to deliver efficient data solutions.
document data architectures, pipelines, and processes.

title: ai engineer
description:
lowongan: ai engineer – pt kian santang muliatama tbk
pt kian santang muliatama tbk bergerak di bidang penyedia alat penunjang minyak dan gas yang berlokasi di bekasi, mencari ai engineer yang antusias, mandiri, dan siap bekerja lintas divisi untuk mengembangkan solusi kecerdasan buatan yang aplikatif, terutama di bidang data analitik, otomatisasi bisnis, dan pengolahan teks/gambar. posisi ini terbuka untuk kamu yang ingin ikut mendorong transformasi digital di sektor industri berbasis data.
 ✅ kualifikasi wajib
pendidikan: minimal s1 di bidang informatika, computer science, matematika, telekomunikasi atau bidang terkait.
pengalaman: minimal 2 tahun di bidang machine learning/ai engineering.
kemampuan teknis:
pemrograman: python (wajib), ai, machine learning
nlp: familiar dengan llm (misalnya openai, cohere, huggingface) dan text summarization
computer vision: pengalaman dengan model deteksi objek, ocr, atau image segmentation.
automation workflow (n8n & zapier)
data pipeline & etl
mahir dengan sql dan pengolahan data dalam skala besar (big data friendly).
paham konsep mlops, tensorflow, gcp (deployment model ai ke sistem produksi).
pengalaman membuat rest api atau integrasi model ai ke aplikasi (chatgpt, whisper).
 ⭐ nilai tambah jika memiliki
portofolio project (github, kaggle, notion, streamlit app, atau lainnya).
pengalaman membangun chatbot, sistem rekomendasi, atau ai assistant.
pengalaman kerja di startup atau industri manufaktur/logistik/energi.
🤝 soft skill
problem solving yang kuat dan kritis.
mampu bekerja mandiri dan dalam tim lintas fungsi.
punya semangat eksplorasi dan tidak takut gagal saat bereksperimen.
etika kerja tinggi dan terbuka menerima feedback.
 📍 lokasi & waktu kerja
lokasi: bekasi
waktu kerja: [senin–jumat, fleksibel 8 jam/hari]

title: map ops associate
description:
about the role
fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our maps ops associate. in this role, you will be an integral player within the cartography team based in jakarta. focusing heavily on improving our map data with quality analysis and smart operations, you will primarily work to improve our maps data for better routing, reduce the map errors, capture traffic local policy and develop your analytical skills to find and solve routing errors due to map data. you will work to make our maps fit for customer’s needs and provide geospatial insights across the company. the folks in the maps operations, data science, product and engineering team will be your companions on this ride. your efforts will directly influence our customer and drivers journey when using the gojek app.
create and edit map data with high quality using geospatial tools
leverage local insights and research skills to conduct quality assessments
use high-tech and low-tech tools and methods to collect and organize map data
coordinate with gojek product teams and engineering to validate map data
communicate progress and results with cartography and other gojek product teams
1-2 years of experience in geospatial data management and operations
proficiency in qgis, osm data structure, having experience in managing road network and/or poi data
proficiency in geospatial etl, qgis, spreadsheet
basic understanding of product metrics, dashboard tools, and geospatial analysis
degree in geography, geodesy, geomatics, urban planning or other relevant field of study
solid communication skills in english, both oral and written
strong problem-solving skills, ability to perform basic spatial analysis to gain insights, paired with good communication and interpersonal skills, and basic analytical rigor/scientific methodology to design and develop project plans
familiarity in basic sql or geospatial python libraries is a bonus
about the team
at the heart of gojek’s businesses, we move things around. whether that’s people, food, packages, or fresh groceries moving things around boils down to understanding the best route, understanding traffic, and understanding locations. the cartography team is a platform team that surfaces mapping technologies needed by all internal product teams and business units within gojek. 
as chicken rice is to the people of singapore, the maps ops team is to cartography: providing the nourishment and power to sustain our business from the inside out. our main responsibility is to build data products for eta prediction, mapping errors detection, map-matching, locations search and ranking, and reverse geocoding. one of our most successful implementations is the generation of new pickup points via unsupervised learning and nlp.  we have deployed the pickup points generation and eta prediction models in our main markets and are aiming at scaling it to the wider region.
while our team is based all over the region, we are a tight-knit group who are bonded by two things: how to grow our maps using strong machine learning, engineering automation, and strong operations and emphasize professional development around these areas 🙌. for real - our weekly conversations range from well, mapping and navigation to competing in friendly online gaming. but whether you like to play online games or you share our love for an afternoon tea/coffee break like us, we’d be stoked to have you join the fam!
about goto group
goto group is the largest digital ecosystem in indonesia with its mission to “empower progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. the goto ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the gojek and goto financial platforms.it is the first platform in southeast asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of indonesia’s vast consumer household.
about gojek 
gojek is southeast asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. with its mission to create impact at scale, gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.
about goto financial
goto financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. its consumer services include gopay and gopaylater and serve businesses of all sizes through midtrans, moka, gobiz plus, gobiz, and selly. with its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, goto financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to make it happen, make it together, make it last.
goto and its business units, including gojek and gotofinancial ("goto") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on linkedin. goto is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. you should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from goto's official recruitment channels.
#li-onsite

title: senior data scientist
description:
role and responsibilities
lead and mentor a team of data scientists to deliver cutting-edge analytics solutions that solve real business problems.
contribute to the deployment of ensemble machine learning methods, deep learning, and advanced optimization techniques to drill into our toughest challenges
leverage sharp research skills to test hypotheses and draw insights to support our goal of industry-leading, resource-efficient copper mining
utilize modern cloud technologies, such as microsoft azure, to deliver innovative analytics solutions at scale and visualize their impact for leadership
actively support the build, implementation, and maintenance of practical, analytical assets that effectively solve business problems using statistical methodologies
 requirements
minimum bachelor’s degree in a technical engineering or analytical field (statistics, mathematics, etc.) or related discipline.
minimum 5 years of experience in data science, including at least 3 years leading a data science team.
proven ability to manage, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of data scientists.
strong expertise in:
predictive modeling: linear/logistic regression, random forest, gradient boosting, etc.
time-series analysis, nlp, anomaly detection, survival analysis.
r and/or python for data analysis and modeling.
sql/hive environments and big data platforms.
hands-on experience with cloud-based machine learning tools (preferably azure).
a strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
proficient in english (verbal and written)
 you should have the following attributes:
you are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
you are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through python, r, sql and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
you are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
you have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
strong oral and written communication skills in english language.
 work environment
travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in jakarta.
occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 why join us?
you will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
working from home during covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
we offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large it environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
you will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

a strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
proficient in english (verbal and written)
 you should have the following attributes:
you are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
you are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through python, r, sql and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
you are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
you have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
strong oral and written communication skills in english language.
 work environment
travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in jakarta.
occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 why join us?
you will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
working from home during covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
we offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large it environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
you will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

title: data annotator
description:
about eterna indonesia:
eterna indonesia is a leader in technology development with a special focus on pioneering web and software solutions. our commitment to innovation and excellence motivates us to grow our team. we are currently seeking a detail-oriented data annotator to support mobile ai training for our international clients on-site in jogjakarta.
about the role
‍we’re looking for a detail-focused data annotator to join our growing team in jogjakarta. in this role, you’ll work closely with international clients and play a key part in supporting ai development by preparing high-quality annotated datasets. your work will directly contribute to the performance of language-based algorithms.
what you’ll work on
collect and organize various types of data (text, images, audio) based on specific project needs
accurately annotate data with a deep understanding of local language nuances, including dialects, slang, and abbreviations
assist in managing and maintaining clean, structured datasets
provide feedback on ambiguous or unclear data to help improve labeling guidelines
support language model evaluations by identifying and reporting data-related issues
requirements
native-level fluency in indonesian
comfortable using android and windows operating systems, and familiar with office tools like word and excel
strong attention to detail, patience, and the ability to perform repetitive tasks over long periods
excellent communication skills and the ability to follow detailed guidelines
proficient in both spoken and written english, with the ability to communicate clearly with international teams
prior experience in data labeling or annotation is a strong advantage
bonus points
previous experience working with international teams
exposure to ai, machine learning projects, or language technology
